ProductInfo.Features:
Free GW190 - 19" professional CCTV LED monitor  with 2xBNC, HDMI and VGA inputs; 1xBNC loop output. Remote Control included for easy switching to different input sources
Free GWZG13 - 15 feet 1.4V HDMI Male to Male cable; 1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x Power pigtail (GW082); 16 x Power pigtail (GW132); 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
4 x HDSDI cameras: GW50HDSDI - HD-SDI 1/3" 2.1 Megapixel CMOS Camera, Progressive Scan, 1080P Video Output Mode, HD-SDI Video Output Level, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens, 72PCs IR LED, 164 feet IR Distance. Vandal proof & water proof
12 x analog cameras: GW71H - 1/3" HDIS CCD Camera, 650TV Line, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR distance, 0.1 Lux Min. illumination
1 x DVR with 6 TB hard drive: GW9216HB - HD-SDI High Definition 16 Channel DVR, 1080P, HD/WD1resolution, 4ch SDI 1080P + 12ch D1 recording +1ch SDI 1080P realtime playback & 1ch D1 realtime playbakc & 16ch playback , 16in/1out, Audio 2in/1out, 4 alarm in/1 out, N9-1. iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. Utilize graphic user interface. Preview, recording, playback, and network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
